verses.verse: And the people <S%H5971><s%> were as murmurers <S%H596><s%>, speaking evil in the ears <S%H7451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H639><s%>, his anger was kindled <S%H2734><s%>; and the fire <S%H784><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them <S%H398><s%>, and devoured in the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the fire <S%H784><s%> abated <S%H8257><s%>.

And the <S%H1931><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Taberah <S%H8404><s%>, because the fire <S%H784><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> burnt among them <S%H1197><s%>.

And the mixed multitude <S%H628><s%> that was among <S%H7130><s%> them lusted <S%H183><s%> exceedingly <S%H1121><s%>: and the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also wept <S%H1058><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Who shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>?

We remember <S%H2142><s%> the fish <S%H1710><s%>, which we did eat <S%H398><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for nought <S%H2600><s%>; the cucumbers <S%H7180><s%>, and the melons <S%H20><s%>, and the leeks <S%H2682><s%>, and the onions <S%H1211><s%>, and the garlic <S%H7762><s%>:
but now our soul <S%H5315><s%> is dried away <S%H3002><s%>; there is nothing at all save <S%H1115><s%> this manna <S%H4478><s%> to look upon <S%H5869><s%>.
And the manna <S%H4478><s%> was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, and the appearance <S%H5869><s%> thereof as the appearance <S%H5869><s%> of bdellium <S%H916><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> went about <S%H7751><s%>, and gathered <S%H3950><s%> it <S%H2912><s%>, and ground it in mills <S%H7347><s%>, or beat <S%H1743><s%> it in mortars <S%H4085><s%>, and boiled <S%H1310><s%> it in pots <S%H6517><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of it <S%H2940><s%>: and the taste of it was as the taste <S%H2940><s%> of fresh <S%H3955><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.
And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> upon the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>, the manna <S%H4478><s%> fell upon it <S%H3381><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of his tent <S%H168><s%>: and the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was displeased <S%H7489><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Wherefore hast thou dealt ill <S%H7489><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>? and wherefore have I not found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, that thou layest <S%H7760><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of all this people upon me <S%H5971><s%>?

Have I conceived <S%H2029><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%>? have I brought them forth <S%H3205><s%>, that thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5375><s%>, Carry them in thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>, as a nursing-father <S%H539><s%> carrieth <S%H5375><s%> the sucking child <S%H3243><s%>, unto the land <S%H127><s%> which thou swarest <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>?

Whence <S%H370><s%> should I have flesh <S%H1320><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto all this people <S%H5971><s%>? for they weep <S%H1058><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, Give <S%H5414><s%> us flesh <S%H1320><s%>, that we may eat <S%H398><s%>.
I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%> alone <S%H905><s%>, because it is too heavy for me <S%H3515><s%>.

And if thou deal <S%H6213><s%> thus with me <S%H2026><s%>, kill me <S%H2026><s%>, I pray thee, out of hand, if I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>; and let me not see <S%H7200><s%> my wretchedness <S%H7451><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Gather <S%H622><s%> unto me seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> to be the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and officers <S%H7860><s%> over them <S%H3947><s%>; and bring them unto the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, that they may stand there with thee <S%H3320><s%>.

And I will come down <S%H3381><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> with thee there <S%H680><s%>: and I will take of the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> which is upon thee <S%H7760><s%>, and will put it upon them <S%H5375><s%>; and they shall bear the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with thee <S%H5375><s%>, that thou bear it not thyself alone.

And say <S%H559><s%> thou unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves against to-morrow <S%H4279><s%>, and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; for ye have wept <S%H1058><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Who shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>? for it was well <S%H2895><s%> with us in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: therefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%>.

Ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, nor two days <S%H3117><s%>, nor five <S%H2568><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, neither ten <S%H6235><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, nor twenty <S%H6242><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>,

but a whole month <S%H2320><s%>, until it come out <S%H3318><s%> at your nostrils <S%H639><s%>, and it be loathsome <S%H2214><s%> unto you <S%H3282><s%>; because that ye have rejected <S%H3988><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> who is among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H1058><s%>, and have wept before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, Why came we forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, The people <S%H5971><s%>, among <S%H7130><s%> whom I am <S%H8337><s%>, are six hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen <S%H7273><s%>; and thou hast said <S%H559><s%>, I will give <S%H5414><s%> them flesh <S%H1320><s%>, that they may eat <S%H398><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.

Shall flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> be slain <S%H7819><s%> for them <S%H4672><s%>, to suffice them <S%H1709><s%>? or shall all the fish of the sea <S%H3220><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%> for them <S%H4672><s%>, to suffice them?

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> waxed short <S%H7114><s%>? now shalt thou see <S%H7200><s%> whether my word <S%H1697><s%> shall come to pass unto thee or not <S%H7136><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>, and told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and he gathered <S%H622><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> them round about <S%H5439><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H680><s%>, and took of the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> that was upon him <S%H5414><s%>, and put it upon the seventy <S%H7657><s%> elders <S%H2205><s%>: and it came to pass <S%H7307><s%>, that, when the Spirit rested <S%H5117><s%> upon them <S%H5012><s%>, they prophesied, but they did so no more <S%H3254><s%>.

But there remained <S%H7604><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>, the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Eldad <S%H419><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Medad <S%H4312><s%>: and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> upon them <S%H3789><s%>; and they were of them that were written, but had not gone out <S%H3318><s%> unto the Tent <S%H168><s%>; and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And there ran <S%H7323><s%> a young man <S%H5288><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Eldad <S%H419><s%> and Medad <S%H4312><s%> do prophesy <S%H5012><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, the minister <S%H8334><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, one of his chosen men <S%H979><s%>, answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, My lord <S%H113><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, forbid them <S%H3607><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7065><s%>, Art thou jealous for my sake <S%H5414><s%>? would that all Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s people <S%H5971><s%> were prophets <S%H5030><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> would put <S%H5414><s%> his Spirit upon them <S%H7307><s%>!
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gat <S%H622><s%> him into the camp <S%H4264><s%>, he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And there went forth <S%H5265><s%> a wind <S%H7307><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and brought <S%H1468><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and let them fall <S%H5203><s%> by the camp <S%H4264><s%>, about a day <S%H3117><s%>'s journey <S%H1870><s%> on this side <S%H3541><s%>, and a day <S%H3117><s%>'s journey <S%H1870><s%> on the other side <S%H3541><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and about two cubits <S%H520><s%> above the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> all that day <S%H3117><s%>, and all the night <S%H3915><s%>, and all the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and gathered <S%H622><s%> the quails <S%H7958><s%>: he that gathered least <S%H4591><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> homers <S%H2563><s%>: and they spread <S%H7849><s%> them all abroad <S%H7849><s%> for themselves round about <S%H5439><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

While the flesh <S%H1320><s%> was yet <S%H2962><s%> between their teeth <S%H8127><s%>, ere it was chewed <S%H3772><s%>, the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the people <S%H5971><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> plague <S%H4347><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H6914><s%>, because there they buried <S%H6912><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that lusted <S%H183><s%>.
From Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H6914><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> unto Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>; and they abode at Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>.
